doctor.name: Dr. Showrab Biswas
doctor.info: Dr. Showrab Biswas is a Hematologist in Chittagong. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Hematology). He is a Consultant, Hematology at Chittagong Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Asperia Health Care Ltd, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Dr. Showrab Biswas at Asperia Health Care Ltd, Chittagong is 1.30pm to 4pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Shamim Ara Begum (Hashy)
doctor.info: Dr. Shamim Ara Begum Hashy, completed her MBBS from Chittagong Medical College followed by an M.Phil in Clinical Pathology from Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University and an FCPS in Hematology from Bangladesh College of Physicians and Surgeons. She has over 7 years experience in Hematology. She is specialized in blood diseases like Anemia, Thalassemia, Hemophilia, Thrombocytopenia, Coagulopathy and blood cancers like Leukemia, Lymphoma, Multiple myeloma etc. She has also experience in Bone Marrow Transplant.
